META_DIRECTION: Text direction. Values have to be '''ltr''' (left to right, as for english) or '''rtl''' (right to left, for sarabic, hebrew, …)
DOCUMENTATION: Link to page with information on this tool
TALK: Link to a talk page on metawiki for discussion of this tool
DESCRIPTION: An enhanced watchlist for Wikimedia projects.
FILTER: Section title for a list of filters
LASTREVONLY: Option to show only the latest edit for a page
MINOR_EDITS: Checkbox to filter out minor edits
BOT_EDITS: Checkbox to filter out bot edits
ANON_EDITS: Checkbox to filter out anonymous user edits
USER_EDITS: Checkbox to filter out registered user edits
FLAGS: Option to show flags instead of language names (e.g. UK flag for english, flag of Germany for german, …)
OAUTH_FAILURE_CONTENT: Error message that MediaWiki login failed
SERVER_ERROR_CONTENT: Error message shown indicating that the server didn't respond.
API_ERROR_CONTENT: Error message shown in case of an MediaWiki API error.
NS_0: MediaWiki namespace name for default namespace
ONELINE: Checkbox to show a MediaWiki style layout
NOTIFICATIONS: Section title for list of Echo notifications
STYLE: Section title for a list of options to change design settings
HIDEOWNEDITS: Checkbox to hide own edits from the watchlist
